name: Crash & Dash
description:
The turtle is falling! Catch as much food as you can as you plunge down to infinity.  Break those pesky obstacles with your hard shell. Try to get as far as you can!

Controls:

Mouse to move 

Hold left mousebutton to go in to break it mode

Credits:

Programmers:

  • Adam Forsell
  • Joakim Stenmark
  • Robert Sandh

Artists:

  • Frida Karlsson
  • Josefin Ramsberg
  • Theresa Andersson
  • Trang Nguyen

This game was created in 48 hours for the Global Game Jam 2022.
